summary: A brief email from an unnamed sender to 'Daniel' regarding scheduling a meeting with an unnamed woman ('Ms') in the context of the Epstein investigation, to introduce themselves and answer her questions. The email suggests coordination around witness or victim outreach.

events.title: Scheduling outreach meeting
events.description: An email is sent to Daniel to check availability for a meeting with an unnamed woman ('Ms') in the afternoon or evening, for introductions and to answer her questions regarding the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 13, 2019, sent during the active Epstein investigation period.
The email discusses scheduling a meeting with an unnamed woman ('Ms') for the purpose of introductions and answering her questions.
The sender and the subject woman are not named, indicating potential redaction or use of placeholder identifiers.
The communication suggests ongoing investigative or legal outreach to individuals connected to the case.
